title: NightCry
notes: Works flawlessly with Steam Launch option "PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%". Game takes a while to start after hitting play, but it does that on Windows too.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes:
PROTON_NO_D3D11=1 %command%
Needed to disable D3d11 because the character models will not appear. Best option so far.
PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%
If use Wine D3d11, the character models appear but mosaic appears on top of the characters. Environment and effects like blood spills are not affected.
title: NightCry
